1.0.0.en: Added support for the devices Zappi, Eddi and Harvi

1.0.1.en: Minor improvements and added Norwegian readme.

1.1.4.en: Added Dutch translation (Thanks to Spijkmans). Included accumulated power consumption for all Zappi CTs with type Internal Load. Also included a setting for displaying negative values or not.

1.2.0.en: Added frequency and settings for customizing charging power calculation for Zappi.

1.3.0.en: Added total energy consumption (power meter) to Zappi

1.4.0.en: Added more human readable variables and tags (#13). Added THEN cards to support charge mode and boost mode (#17). Added slider to manually set min. green level. Reordered the sensor page and some bug fixes.

1.4.2.en: Improved pairing logic for Harvi and Eddi devices

1.5.0.en: Added remaining boost kWh to sensor page.

1.5.1.en: Improved text on flow card titles.

1.5.2.en: Added a setting for adjusting total energy consumption offset for Zappi

1.5.3.en: Added improvements to settings page. Introduced API base url field in settings. Improved API authentication and redirection.

1.5.4.en: Improved authentication logic on app settings page.

1.6.0.en: Added new EV connected capability and included it in flows

1.6.1.en: Fixed a bug that prevented control of multiple Zappi units from a flow.

1.7.0.en: Added total power and energy to Harvi device, together with a few extra capabilities.

1.7.1.en: Fixed a bug that prevented new Harvi devices from being added.

1.7.2.en: Bugfix for failing charge mode settings via flows

1.7.3.en: Added cumulative energy flag to Harvi to be able to exclude it from total power calculation.

1.7.5.en: Fixed a bug that crashed the app when setting total energy offset on Zappi and Harvi

1.7.6.en: Fixed a bug that crashed the app when setting total energy offset on Zappi and Harvi

1.8.0.en: Added possibility to see connected site and hub in device settings

1.9.0.en: Added more capabilities to Eddi device and the possibility to adjust and reset energy usage. Bug fixes.

1.9.1.en: Added new, and re-arranged Eddi capabilities to support more CT clamps.

1.9.2.en: Added more power capabilities to Eddi
